title: Design Practice-Integrated Instructional Design Based on Environmental Education

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of basic design principles and practical experience
context.additional_context: Emphasizing creative design approaches for solving environmental issues targeting current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners complete environmental problem-solving design projects using a four-stage action research process (plan-act-observe-reflect).
Learners can apply sustainable design principles (resource efficiency, ecological preservation, etc.) to actual design tasks.
Learners develop creative design solutions in online environments using team-based digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
